Description

TIS THE SEASON for a holiday RAVE!! Tiny Waves presents the OFFICIAL pre-party for Holiday Matsuri 2022! Join us for a fun and festive celebration at Level 13 Event Center on Saturday, December 3rd featuring a joyful holiday blend of our iconic K-POP RAVE & CosRave events!

K-POP RAVE (3 HOUR BLOCK):
PolyKor & Fortune Swan

Featured EDM performances:

dj-Jo, KINO, & Jams Bond (Ben Briggs b2b H808)

We’ll be opening the evening with the EDM sets, and once we get warmed up, it’ll be the best K-Pop for the rest of the night! Be sure to wear your best festive fits, as we’ll have a FREE PHOTO BOOTH to commemorate the holiday cheer! Happy Holidays, and see you at the rave!!

  • 9PM-2AM / Doors open at 8PM / Ages 18+
  • Presented by Tiny Waves & Blaze Entertainment
  • Officially Sponsored by Holiday Matsuri
  • Free professional photos at the photo booth outside
  • Safe Space, Zero Tolerance for Harassment
  • No Large Bags, No Weapons or Outside Alcohol
  • No Large Bags, No Weapons or Outside Alcohol
